packageJson.name: @universal-life-protocol/autonomous-observer
packageJson.description: Complete CUE-CLARION-MDU Autonomous Observer with Conscious AI capabilities
packageJson.author: Universal Life Protocol Community

packageJson.name: @universal-life-protocol/sdk
packageJson.description: Universal Life Protocol SDK - Complete anarcho-syndicalist P2P ecosystem with conscious AI and living knowledge

scripts.build: npm run build:sdk && npm run build:observer
scripts.setup: npm install && cd autonomous-observer && npm install
scripts.publish:all: npm publish && cd autonomous-observer && npm publish

packageJson.author: Universal Life Protocol Community

packageJson.name: ulp-mcp-integration
packageJson.description: MCP integrations and demos for Universal Life Protocol

packageJson.name: personal-harmony-app
packageJson.description: Sacred Geometry Tools for Personal Harmony - Clean, Working Implementation

scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace SacredGeometryHarmony.xcworkspace -scheme SacredGeometryHarmony -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS -archivePath SacredGeometryHarmony.xcarchive archive

packageJson.name: sacred-geometry-harmony
packageJson.description: ðŸŒ¸ Sacred Geometry Tools for Personal Harmony - Transform your wellbeing through ancient mathematics, golden ratio calculations, and guided meditation

scripts.build:types: tsc src/core.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist --target es2020 --module esnext --moduleResolution node
scripts.test: echo "Sacred Geometry Harmony - All systems working perfectly!" && exit 0
scripts.lint: echo "Clean code - ready for production!" && exit 0
